summary: The module defines a collection of mock components and test harnesses for the JMDaemon communication protocol, including dummy message channels, server and client protocol simulations, factories, and unit test cases that exercise initialization, asynchronous waiting, and message handling logic.
business_intent: To validate and safeguard the correct operation of the JMDaemon protocol by providing automated tests and mock implementations that simulate real-world clientâ€‘server interactions, enabling developers to detect regressions and ensure protocol reliability.
